title-part.text: INDEXING SCHEME RELATING TO MATERIALS, MATERIAL PROPERTIES OR MATERIAL CHARACTERISTICS FOR MACHINES, ENGINES OR PUMPS OTHER THAN NON-POSITIVE-DISPLACEMENT MACHINES OR ENGINES

note.note-paragraph: This subclass constitutes an internal scheme for indexing only.

title-part.text: Rare earth metals, e.g. Sc, Y
Spheroidal graphite cast iron, e.g. nodular iron, ductile iron
